Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Among the seven contributing centers , the proportion of patients for whom the observed phenotype did not match the predicted phenotype was 4 % - 23 % ( P < . 0001 ) , suggesting that differences in methods used for mutation detection or phenotype classification may account for a considerable proportion of genotype - phenotype inconsistencies .

Let's think step by step.

The two entities in the paragraph that refer to diseases are "phenotype" and "genotype". These terms are used to describe the physical and genetic characteristics of an individual, respectively, and are commonly used in the context of medical genetics to describe diseases or disorders.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
